entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 a.m. ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Precipitation, 0.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 1:30 PM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

Temperature: 0.8°C

Visibility: 4 km
Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
